author: Business Wire
title: OneLegacy Partnered with Danny Trejo and Trejo Music to Host SOULDIEZ Concert Featuring Talented Artists, Lowriders, Trejo’s Tacos and More | User | dailytimesleader.com
text:
The Event was a Great Success and Shared the Importance of Organ, Eye and Tissue Donation with Hundreds of Event Attendees
OneLegacy Inspires Hollywood partnered with Danny Trejo and Trejo Music to present SOULDIEZ, a music concert that took place at the OneLegacy’s Headquarters in Azusa with the goal of sharing the power of music with the critical message of organ donation and transplantation. Hundreds of concert goers visited the local organ procurement organization last Saturday, and enjoyed the show hosted by legendary actor and musician, Danny Trejo, co-hosted by Becky Lu, and including the performances of Baby Bash, Cota the Barber, Pepe Marquez, Amoraa, Tarah New, and Raquel. The event also included testimonials from donor families, transplant recipients and living donors.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240314417274/en/
OneLegacy's Surgical Team received a special shoutout from Danny Trejo during Trejo Music's Concert, SOULDIEZ, which took place at the OneLegacy Headquarters in Azusa. (Photo: OneLegacy)
A portion of the funds raised by this concert will be donated to the OneLegacy Foundation to help promote public education efforts to inspire local communities to Donate Life. With over 100,000 men, women, and children currently waiting for a lifesaving organ transplant in the U.S., OneLegacy continuously connects with local communities to inspire them to say “YES” to organ, eye and tissue donation and register as donors.
“Our partnership with Danny Trejo has opened the doors to a group of talented musicians and producers, ‘Connecting the Dots’ with a greater audience of Trejo fans and local community members that trust Danny as a native Angelino,” said E’Tiffany Jones, Head of Communications and Strategic Partnerships at OneLegacy. “We are excited about the upcoming initiatives between OneLegacy and Danny Trejo’s enterprises, and we are immensely grateful to Danny and his team for using their voice and platform to lift our mission.”
The OneLegacy surgical team took the stage for a moment of acknowledgement. Trejo claimed, “There are angels among us,” to which the team received a standing ovation.
Hundreds of guests from around Los Angeles visited OneLegacy on Saturday, March 9. The event included a display of lowrider cars, a special meet and greet session with Danny Trejo, merchandise from Trejo’s Music Label and Danny Trejo, raffle prizes provided by OneLegacy and the OneLegacy Ambassadors, a 90’s inspired photo booth and food and drinks provided by Trejo’s Tacos.
About OneLegacy
OneLegacy is the nonprofit organization dedicated to saving lives through organ, eye and tissue donation in seven counties in Southern California: Los Angeles, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, Ventura, Santa Barbara and Kern. It serves more than 200 hospitals, 10 transplant centers, a diverse population of 20 million people across the region and waiting recipients across the country. Becoming an eye, organ or tissue donor is easy and can be done by registering online at donateLIFEcalifornia.org/OneLegacy or by “checking YES” at your local DMV. For more information, visit OneLegacy.org .
View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240314417274/en/
Contacts Tania Llavaneras, OneLegacy

author: Garrettsiuf
title: Deck Footings Introduced: Structure a Secure Base for Your Desire Deck
text:
Necessary Tips for Solid Deck Footing: A Comprehensive Guide
Building a deck is an investment that requires careful planning and focus to detail, especially when it comes to the footing. This guide will cover critical facets such as selecting the ideal materials, examining dirt problems, calculating tons ability, figuring out appropriate ground deepness, and achieving specific setup. Let's dive into the world of strong deck footing and develop a foundation you can rely on.
Picking the Right Deck Ground Materials
When picking the best deck footing products, it is vital to think about the specific demands and demands of your project. The top quality and resilience of the grounds straight affect the stability and durability of the deck framework. There are several aspects to consider when choosing deck ground materials.
Clay soils often tend to maintain water, while sandy dirts drain pipes rapidly. Comprehending your soil problems will aid you pick grounds that can successfully support the weight of the deck and prevent concerns such as sinking or heaving - Deck Footings.
Extreme temperatures, moisture degrees, and freeze-thaw cycles can impact the efficiency of deck footings. In such situations, making use of frost-resistant materials or installing grounds below the frost line can help minimize these dangers.
Furthermore, the dimension and design of your deck should additionally affect your choice of footing materials. Larger or more complicated decks may call for deeper or reinforced grounds to guarantee ample assistance. Understanding the specific load demands of your deck will assist you identify the appropriate products to use.
Eventually, choosing the ideal deck ground materials includes cautious factor to consider of factors such as soil problems, climate, and deck layout. By taking these aspects into account, you can select grounds that provide the needed assistance, improve the security of your deck, and guarantee its durability.
Correctly Analyzing Dirt Problems
To correctly evaluate soil problems for your deck footing, it is vital to extensively assess the load-bearing capacities and drainage residential properties of the dirt in your location. Recognizing the dirt's capacity to birth weight and its capacity to drain pipes excess water will certainly help guarantee the security and durability of your deck.
When analyzing the load-bearing capacity of the soil, it is important to take into consideration aspects such as soil kind, thickness, and compaction. Various soil kinds have differing load-bearing abilities, with compacted dirts usually supplying better support than loose or sandy dirts. Performing a dirt examination can supply valuable information concerning the dirt's capacity to sustain the weight of your deck.
Furthermore, reviewing the drain homes of the soil is necessary to protect against water buildup and prospective damage to your deck - Deck Footings. Poor drain can bring about moisture accumulation, which can weaken the structure and cause structural problems. It is vital to assess the soil's capability to drain water efficiently to avoid these troubles
Consulting with a professional engineer or dirt specialist can greatly assist in appropriately evaluating dirt conditions for your deck ground. They can provide skilled recommendations and guidance, making sure that you choose the proper ground design and materials based on the certain features of the dirt in your area. Putting in the time to completely assess dirt conditions will aid you build a strong and durable deck.
Calculating Tons Capacity for Footings
One vital action in ensuring the stability of your deck is to accurately calculate the lots ability for your grounds. Deck Footings. The load capability describes the optimum amount of weight or lots that the footings can securely sustain without causing any kind of architectural damage or failing. Calculating the tons capacity for grounds entails considering different aspects such as the size and kind of grounds, the kind of soil, the dimensions and weight of the deck, and the real-time load and dead tons that the deck will certainly undergo
To compute the lots capability, it is very important to consult regional building regulations and guidelines
hereas they offer certain guidelines and needs for deck building. These codes think about variables such as dirt bearing capability, frost depth, and minimal ground dimensions. Furthermore, it is vital to involve the services of a professional service provider or an architectural designer that can do the required estimations and assessments to ensure the safety and security of the deck.
When determining the load capacity, it is vital to precisely figure out the real-time tons and dead lots that the deck will certainly experience. The real-time load refers to the weight of people, furnishings, and any kind of various other items that will certainly be put on the deck, while the dead lots describes the weight of the deck itself. By properly establishing these loads and considering all appropriate elements, you can ensure that your grounds are sufficiently developed to sustain the weight and preserve the security of your deck.
Making Sure Proper Ground Depth
Correct footing deepness is critical for making sure the stability and long life of your deck. The depth at which the grounds are mounted directly influences the architectural honesty of the deck, as it establishes how well the footings can stand up to the forces put in by the deck and the dirt below it.
When identifying the suitable footing depth, several elements have to be considered. In areas with extensive clay soil, deeper footings might be needed to give ample assistance.
To establish the
visitproper footing depth, it is recommended to talk to an architectural engineer or structure examiner that can assess the certain conditions of your site and offer support based upon local building ordinance and regulations. They will take into consideration aspects such as dirt make-up, groundwater level degree, and anticipated tons to figure out the minimum needed ground depth.
Setting Up Footings With Precision
Installing footings with precision is necessary for ensuring the stability and architectural integrity of your deck. Appropriately mounted grounds give a solid structure, making sure that your deck can withstand the weight of furniture, individuals, and various other lots. To mount grounds with precision, there are a number of essential actions to adhere to.
To start with, it is very important to precisely note the place of each ground. This can be done by utilizing a string or chalk line to produce a clear synopsis. By measuring and marking the specific positions, you can ensure that the grounds are evenly spaced and aligned.
Next, you need to dig the openings for the grounds. It is critical to dig them to the correct deepness and diameter, as defined by local building regulations and laws. This will offer adequate assistance and protect against the deck from moving or sinking gradually.
As soon as the holes are dug, it is necessary to degree and portable the soil at the base of each hole. This will certainly develop a stable base for the ground to remain on and avoid any kind of settling or movement.
After preparing the openings, you can proceed with pouring the concrete. Utilize a concrete mix that is ideal for grounds and adhere to the manufacturer's instructions for pouring and blending. Ensure that the concrete fills the holes completely and is degree with the ground surface area.
Lastly, enable the concrete to cure correctly prior to waging the construction of your deck. This will make sure that the grounds are stable and strong, supplying a safe and secure foundation for your deck.
Conclusion
In conclusion, ensuring strong deck footing is essential for the stability and long life of a deck framework. By picking the ideal footing materials, assessing dirt conditions, determining lots ability, and installing footings with accuracy, the danger of structural failure can be reduced. Following these vital ideas will help produce a strong structure for any type of deck project.
Recognizing your soil problems will assist you choose grounds that can successfully support the weight of the deck and protect against problems such as heaving or sinking.
Consulting with a specialist engineer or soil specialist can considerably aid in appropriately evaluating soil conditions for your deck footing. Computing the tons capacity for grounds entails considering numerous variables such as the dimension and kind of footings, the type of dirt, the measurements and weight of the deck, and the online load and dead lots that the deck will be subjected to.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 油气ETF华泰柏瑞（561570）跌1.83%，半日成交额131.67万元|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，油气ETF华泰柏瑞（561570）跌1.83%，报0.968元，成交额131.67万元。油气ETF华泰柏瑞（561570）重仓股方面， 中国石化 截止午盘跌0.35%， 中国石油 跌1.09%， 中国海油 跌0.78%， 广汇能源 跌1.14%， 杰瑞股份 跌1.10%， 卫星化学 跌1.65%， 招商轮船 跌1.38%， 恒力石化 跌0.91%， 荣盛石化 跌1.58%， 东方盛虹 跌1.10%。
油气ETF华泰柏瑞（561570）业绩比较基准为中证油气产业指数收益率，管理人为华泰柏瑞基金管理有限公司，基金经理为李沐阳，成立（2024-10-09）以来回报为-1.65%，近一个月回报为5.09%。
